About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a Full Stack Web Developer who is able to help businesses reach consumers through the development of well produced applications. Previously I held positions in retail and mobile phone sales and am currently working as an Elections Assistant for the Riverside County Registrar of Voters. Where duties range from overseeing and training small groups of temporary workers to perform the processing of all polling sites voting equipment to creating reports and spreadsheets for long term ballot storage. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, Sass, Javascript, JQuery, and M.E.R.N stack and continue these practices daily. While building a strong foundation of knowledge by doing assignments in University of California Riversideâ€™s Coding Bootcamp. I have also built a number of personal projects to further my education during and after the program. I look to bring my passion for development and learning to future employers and be a positive asset to their development team.
